price: 189. Mpe maye manso mazali o’likolo mpe na nsé, mazali ya Allah, mpe Allah azali na nguya likolo ya biloko binso.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٌ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: walillahi mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wal-lahu ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
